title: Spectra - energy change from 500 nm photon

content.question: A photon of wavelength <math alttext="500 nanometers" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>500</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>nm</mtext></math> is absorbed by an atom as the atom transitions between two different energy states.
